alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 7:46PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 815 PM MST... At 746 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arizola, or near Casa Grande, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Arizona City, Arizola and Toltec. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 189 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 166 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
